verses.verse: By night <WH3915> on my bed <WH4904> I sought <WH1245> him whom my soul <WH5315> loves <WH157>: I sought <WH1245> him <WH4672>, but I found him not.

I will rise <WH6965> now <WH5437>, and go about the city <WH5892> in the streets <WH7784>, and in the broad ways <WH7339> I will seek <WH1245> him whom my soul <WH5315> loves <WH157>: I sought <WH1245> him <WH4672>, but I found him not.
The watchmen <WH8104> that go about <WH5437> the city <WH5892> found <WH4672> me <WH7200>: to whom I said, Saw you him whom my soul <WH5315> loves <WH157>?

It was but a little <WH4592> that I passed <WH5674> from them <WH4672>, but I found him whom my soul <WH5315> loves <WH157>: I held <WH270> him <WH7503>, and would not let him go, until I had brought <WH935> him into my mother <WH517>'s house <WH1004>, and into the chamber <WH2315> of her that conceived me <WH2029>.

I charge <WH7650> you <WH1323>, O you daughters of Jerusalem <WH3389>, by the roes <WH6643>, and <WH176> by the hinds <WH355> of the field <WH7704>, that you stir not up <WH5782>, nor awake <WH5782> my love <WH160>, until he please <WH2654>.

Who is this that comes <WH5927> out of the wilderness <WH4057> like pillars <WH8490> of smoke <WH6227>, perfumed <WH6999> with myrrh <WH4753> and frankincense <WH3828>, with all powders <WH81> of the merchant <WH7402>?
Behold his bed <WH4296>, which is Solomon <WH8010>'s; sixty <WH8346> valiant <WH1368> men are about <WH5439> it <WH1368>, of the valiant of Israel <WH3478>.
They all hold <WH270> swords <WH2719>, being expert <WH3925> in war <WH4421>: every man <WH376> has his sword <WH2719> upon his thigh <WH3409> because of fear <WH6343> in the night <WH3915>.
King <WH4428> Solomon <WH8010> made <WH6213> himself a chariot <WH668> of the wood <WH6086> of Lebanon <WH3844>.

He made <WH6213> the pillars <WH5982> there of silver <WH3701>, the bottom <WH7507> there of gold <WH2091>, the covering <WH4817> of it of purple <WH713>, the middle <WH8432> there being paved <WH7528> with love <WH160>, for the daughters <WH1323> of Jerusalem <WH3389>.

Go forth <WH3318>, O you daughters <WH1323> of Zion <WH6726>, and behold <WH7200> king <WH4428> Solomon <WH8010> with the crown <WH5850> with which his mother <WH517> crowned <WH5849> him in the day <WH3117> of his espousals <WH2861>, and in the day <WH3117> of the gladness <WH8057> of his heart <WH3820>.
